actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to increase the exemption from Commission approval for certain motor carrier transfers.

summary.text: Amends the Interstate Commerce Act to allow Class III motor carriers (passenger and freight motor carriers having annual gross operating revenues not exceeding $200,000 and $500,000 respectively) to enter into unification, merger or acquisition of control transactions without the approval of the Interstate Commerce Commission.

titles.title: A bill to increase the exemption from Commission approval for certain motor carrier transfers.
